ground_truth_reviews.comment: The `create_post` function signature is missing type annotations for the `post_create` parameter and its return value. Adding type hints (e.g., `post_create: PostCreate` and `-> Post`) is crucial for code clarity and enables static analysis tools to catch errors early. In FastAPI, this also drives automatic request validation and response model serialization, so omitting them can lead to unexpected runtime behavior.

title: feat: Add endpoint for creating posts
body: This commit adds a new POST /posts endpoint. Clients can now submit post data to this endpoint to create a new post in the system.
